::Striker/Zardus/DevilDuer/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Walking out of the Ark after Iron Raptor, Striker is hit by the newcomer's 
shots, rolling behind a boulder and firing at Unitron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus nods, looking at Dark One. "Very well, co-" He is interrupted by the 
scanners, reporting the attack of the Ark. He growls, looking from one 
scanner to another.

"Bloodystrike, how much energon do we have?"

Bloodystrike turns around, "About 340 kilograms."

Zardus nods, turning to the others assembled and activating his comm-link to 
send all he says to all Alliance members. "Allright. The predacons and the 
newcomers are jointly attacking the Ark. If the maximals fall, there is 
nothing to prevent Hell Beast to turn on us. So..."

He turns to look at the scanners once again, a plan forming in his mind as he 
sees that Iron Raptor and Tavatron had left the Ark.

"Nemesis Enforcer, Scattershot, Delta, DevilDuer, Zergling, Oinker, you will 
go to the Ark, attacking the attackers from behind."

He turns to the Oblitercons. "If you will participate in this battle, I will 
add a bonus of 100 kilograms of energon to your payment. If so, also go 
attack the Ark."

He then turns to Reptilica and Bloodystrike. "You two and Perndabot will 
accompany me to intercept Iron Raptor and her friend. They will come in 
usefull in future dealings with the maximals. As soon as we have secured 
those two, me and Perndabot will join the battle at the Ark, Reptilica and 
Bloodystrike will stay here and defend the base in case of an attack."

He looks around the room. "Any questions?"
